title: Traps & Doors
data:
{{Obsolete}}
''For the later but still obsolete version of this skill, see [[Traps (skill)]].''

'''Traps & Doors''' was the skill that let you detect and disarm [[trap]]s (hold CTRL while moving in the direction of the trap; not all traps could be disarmed) as well as find hidden [[door]]s. Higher skill let you disarm traps with a better chance of success and detect traps before stepping on them. Most players would want to eventually train in this skill to avoid the deadly [[Zot trap]]s of the deeper floors.

Traps & Doors could always be trained.

==History==
In [[0.12]], hidden doors were removed from the game. As a result, the name of this skill was changed to [[Traps]]. In [[0.13]], the skill was removed entirely. Instead, traps are detected based on your experience level, and secret doors are no more.
